price: 29. Bökende epai ya maye bozalaki kozua yango nalokuta.
arabic: ٱنطَلِقُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: inṭaliqū ilā mā kuntum bihi tukadhibūna
